sentences.en: A British bishop has already advised his diocese to suspend holy water from churches in a bid to halt the spread of the A(H1N1) virus.
sentences.cn: 一位英国主教已经建议他主管教区的教堂暂停供应圣水，从而防止甲型H1N1流感病毒的传播。

sentences.en: Authorities have also allowed the bishop to receive visits from priests from his diocese.
sentences.cn: 当局还允许他教区的牧师到他家中去探访.

sentences.en: He was ordained bishop and assumed the cathedra of the Diocese of Taichung in 1986.
sentences.cn: 他在1986年获任命为主教出任台中教区的主教宝座.

sentences.en: The diocese does not deny the copying, but says he probably did not know of the reassignment.
sentences.cn: 主教教区没有否认那个记录但是表示它或许对于重新任职一无所知。

sentences.en: The diocese of D ---- is a fatiguing one.
sentences.cn: 迪 涅 教区是个苦地方.

sentences.en: The diocese publishes two weekly newspapers, Kung Kao Po and The Sunday Examiner.
sentences.cn: 罗马天主教香港教区每周出版中英文《公教报》各一份.

sentences.en: There had been various rumors the moment he arrived in the diocese.
sentences.cn: 他一进入主教辖区就有各种各样的谣言传出.

sentences.en: You heard about the diocese of Camden?
sentences.cn: 你听到关于卡姆登教区的事了 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: the area under the control of a  bishop  in some Christian churches
